about_the_game: The Art of What Lies in the Multiverse is a dedicated digital artbook comprised of 48 pages of artwork from the team at Studio Voyager and IguanaBee. See the wonderful and charming pixel art process unfold from each page to the next covering environments, characters, objects, lighting and more.
detailed_description: The Art of What Lies in the Multiverse is a dedicated digital artbook comprised of 48 pages of artwork from the team at Studio Voyager and IguanaBee. See the wonderful and charming pixel art process unfold from each page to the next covering environments, characters, objects, lighting and more.

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M, 2 GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
